title.en: Temporal Attention Networks for Early Battery Degradation Prediction
title.zh-Hans: 用于电池早期退化预测的时间注意力网络

summary.en: A transformer-based architecture that predicts lithium-ion battery remaining useful life from the first 100 charge-discharge cycles with 8.2% MAPE.
summary.zh-Hans: 一种基于Transformer的架构，利用前100个充放电循环预测锂离子电池剩余使用寿命，MAPE为8.2%。

abstract.en: Accurate early prediction of lithium-ion battery degradation is critical for electric vehicle fleet management. We propose BatteryFormer, a temporal attention network that processes charge-discharge voltage curves as sequences. Using only the first 100 cycles, our model predicts end-of-life cycle number with 8.2% mean absolute percentage error on the MIT-Stanford battery dataset.
abstract.zh-Hans: 锂离子电池退化的准确早期预测对电动车队管理至关重要。我们提出BatteryFormer，一种将充放电电压曲线作为序列处理的时间注意力网络。仅使用前100个循环，我们的模型在MIT-Stanford电池数据集上以8.2%的平均绝对百分比误差预测寿命终止循环数。
